item.title: Break into your puppet code
item.description: The puppet 4 language introduced a slew of new features that gives us enormous amounts of power and flexibility. So much so that puppet code can become complex and often hard to understand at a glance. A way to combat this complexity is to write unit tests to validate the end state. However, one of the shortcomings of unit testing with rspec-puppet is that you can only test against the end state.
